-- Log raw event for audit trail
INSERT INTO finance.raw_events (
  event_type,
  raw_payload,
  client_id,
  source_identifier,
  validation_status
)
VALUES (
  'income_webhook',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.body) }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.body.client_id }}',
  '{{ $json.headers["x-forwarded-for"] || $json.headers["x-real-ip"] || "webhook" }}',
  'pending'
)
RETURNING id, raw_payload;

-- Insert transaction with server-parsed values
INSERT INTO finance.transactions (
  transaction_at,
  date,
  merchant_name,
  amount,
  currency,
  category,
  notes,
  is_recurring,
  client_id
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz,
  finance.to_business_date('{{ $json.transaction_at }}'::timestamptz),
  '{{ $json.source }}',
  {{ $json.amount }},
  '{{ $json.currency }}',
  '{{ $json.category }}',
  {{ $json.notes ? "'" + $json.notes + "'" : "NULL" }},
  {{ $json.is_recurring }},
  '{{ $json.client_id }}'
)
ON CONFLICT (client_id) DO NOTHING
RETURNING id, merchant_name, amount, currency, date;
